text:
t is the outlook for Ohtahara Syndrome ?,"The course of Ohtahara syndrome is severely progressive. Seizures become more frequent, accompanied by delays in physical and cognitive development.Some children will die in infancy; others will survive but be profoundly handicapped. As they grow, some children will progress into other epileptic disorders such as West syndrome and Lennox-Gestaut syndrome.",NINDS,Ohtahara Syndrome
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Ohtahara Syndrome ?,"T
